data_path.__doc__: data path of the  dataset, default settings are in datamanger

dataset.dataset_name: name of the dataset: oasis2d, lpba, ibsr, cmuc
dataset.divided_ratio: divided the dataset into train, val and test set by the divided_ratio

label_path.__doc__: data path of the  dataset, default settings are in datamanger

dataset.output_path: the path to save the processed data

reg.axis: which axis needed to be sliced
reg.slicing: the index to be sliced from the 3d image dataset, support lpba, ibsr, cmuc

switch.switch_to_exist_task: switch to existed task without modify other datapro settings
